synthesis_conditions.equipment: Bruker Smart APEX CCD area diffractometer with a helium-flow temperature controller (Japan Thermal Eng. TC-10 KCP) and graphite-monochromated MoKa radiation (l = 0.71073 C)
synthesis_conditions.method: sealed in a glass capillary containing liquid oxygen in a liquid-nitrogen bath
synthesis_conditions.refinement: full-matrix least-squares calculations on F2 (SHELXL-97) with the SHELX-TL program package
synthesis_conditions.hydrogen_atoms_refinement: fixed at calculated positions and refined with a riding model

synthesis_conditions.method: packed in a glass tube with pressurized oxygen gas
synthesis_conditions.additional_info: The glass cell has a mechanism that can separate the condensed excess oxygen from the crystals of 2.
synthesis_conditions.molar_magnetization_calculation_basis: mass of 2 with the chemical composition of 2Â·3 O2 after deducting the trace background values of cell and host crystal 2
